thread.title: Motorola Moto X Style Available for Pre-Order in the UK for £399 and Up
thread.title_full: Motorola Moto X Style Available for Pre-Order in the UK for £399 and Up - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Motorola Moto X Style Available for Pre-Order in the UK for £399 and Up
text: In late July, Motorola hosted a press event during which we saw the advent of three handsets: the Moto X Play, the Moto X Style, and the third-gen Moto G. The Moto X Style is the flagship device out of the three and now the company has just started offering it in select markets. As of this week, the device is up for pre-order in the UK, and as promised, Motorola is also offering Moto Maker customization in the country. British customers will be able to get it starting at £3... »
